Class DescribeConfigsOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.kafka.clients.admin.AbstractOptions<DescribeConfigsOptions>
      • org.apache.kafka.clients.admin.DescribeConfigsOptions

  • @InterfaceStability.Evolving
public class DescribeConfigsOptions
extends AbstractOptions<DescribeConfigsOptions>
    Options for AdminClient.describeConfigs(Collection). The API of this class is evolving, see AdminClient for details.
